description: I would recommend this application as a demonstration to friends about how much "harder linux is compared to that windows gumball machine." Great for april fools, frustration ahead please guard hardware in the local area you don't want damaged. Confirm your superior computer skills as a positive side effect. It also means you can no longer help with their machine when it needs repair.
summary: rumors of a gofundme lottery for the first screen shot of a win

description: If you can't respect somebody writing a usable solitaire game using only curses, you don't belong on a linux machine.
J'arrive pas à ouvrir ce jeu
summary: J'arrive pas à ouvrir ce jeu
